channel.title: Perfect ring
channel.description: how i make perfect ring only admins can wear? or unspawnble for players and mods

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

replace your ::pickup with this:

                if(command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 1) {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]);
                        if(newItemID == 773 && playerRights <= 2) {
                                sM("you can't spawn this item!");
                        } else if (newItemID == 773 && playerRights >= 2) {
                                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        }
                        if(inCombat) {
                                sM("you can't spawn items while you're in combat!");
                        } else {
                                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        }
                }

then search for

if(wearID ==

and find the end of the block. should be something like this:

if(wearID == 35){
if(gsrights == 0) {
sM("you need to buy the rights to wear an armadyl godsword!");
}

add this under the }

if(wearID == 773) {
if(playerRights < 2) {
sM("you can't wear a p ring yet!");
return false;
} else {
currentHealth = 999999;
}
}

note: before you work, backup your client.java

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

Find this in your client.java

if(wearID ==

then add this under the }

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights == 3) { currentHealth = 10000000; }

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

In the same method, the wear method, add this:

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights == 3) { currentHealth = 10000000; }

Depending on if you’re Delta or not, currentHealth may or may not work.

item.title: Perfect ring
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

If you have it, in your wear method, put this.

if(wearID == 773 && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 2){ sM("This is for administrators only!"); deleteItem(773, 1); return false; }

To make it unspawnable, simply write a line of code excluding the pring in your pickup command.

if(newItemID != 773 && playerRights != 3) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);// The part of your code that adds the item. }

Your variables may not be newItemID and newItemAmount. If they aren’t just change them to yours.

Read full topic
